message:
That moment when you're finally done with your makeup and you see this mess on your vanity! :P

What can we say…beauty does come with a price - in this case, this mess of shimmer and colour is worth it!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Get your hands on the versatile Shimmer Brick - It's one of our essentials that can help spice up an otherwise plain makeup look. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Never run out of shades to try with the Mini Luxe Lip set! 

With 10 different shades to wear, You can wear out a different lip every day of the week (and even have some spares)!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

A little extra touch of gold doesn't hurt, especially during this festive period! 

The new individual Luxe Eyeshadow cubes don't only look good on your lids, they add a gorgeous flair to your makeup stash too! 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Ladies, can you guess what's housed in the golden cube? 

We'll give you a hint: think lots of glitter and pigment!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Play up your lip colour your way! We get it…some days you might feel like putting on a nude pink lip and on others you just want to wear a bright, cheery red. 

The question is: what shade are you feeling today?

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

More reasons for more shopping (sans the guilt) with these Black Friday/Cyber Monday deals! Drop by our stores to see what we have up for grabs. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Looking to impress the woman of your dreams this Christmas? 

Try this top tip: get her a makeup care-pack! That'll help you score extra points for sure!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Wing that wing liner straight out of the park with this mini duo Long-Wear Gel Eyeliner set! 

The set comes with a Mini Ultra Fine Brush as well to help you nail that sharp catliner every time. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Have you curated your own wishlist yet? 

Let us know what products you're eyeing in the comments below! While you're at it, why not tag a friend to drop a hint? ;)

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

The finest makeup products should only be applied with the softest brushes - and that we have! 

This Travel Brush Set comes with all the essentials - think foundation, blusher, liner AND eye shadow - in a beautiful Burgundy hard case. Think of it as a basic starter kit that any woman would love (except it's not basic at all, if you get what we mean!). 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Ladies in the East, we're back for you!
 
The newly renovated Tampines Mall store is sure to give you a more comprehensive and exciting shopping experience. We recently celebrated its opening with a private event to also mark the launch of our holiday collection. 

Have a feel of the new store; Pop by to say hello!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG
story: Bobbi Brown Cosmetics added 4 new photos.
Bobbi Brown Cosmetics updated their cover photo.

message:
Why settle for less when you can go for GOLD? 

Our Luxe Lip collection is out to set heart aflutter this Christmas with a new range of limited edition shades to add to your own stash. Needless to say, there'll be more luxe for you ladies to lust for this holidays!

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG
Show yourself some love this Singles Day!

Enough with all that talk, we want all things shiny and pigmented and we want it now! 

We're here to assure you…this Holiday collection will certainly not disappoint. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

We’re loving all things Red and deliciously luxurious this Christmas! 

If you're on the same page as us, you will LOVE this Caviar & Rubies collection we've got going on this year. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Did someone say just say "Extra Glow?"

Well, one thing's for sure, if it's that extra glow you're looking for, this skincare trio is will help you achieve just that. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG

Grab hold of your most efficient shopping partner & put on the most comfortable pair of shoes you've got - it's almost time for all that Christmas shopping again. 

#BobbiBrown #BobbiBrownSG
Handing it over to our Studio Manager, Sharon Wong, to prep us for the weekend!

We're LIVE this afternoon with Ting Lin, showcasing our NEW Skin Long Wear Weightless SPF 50 PA+++ Full Cover Cushion Compact ! 

She's doing a live makeup demonstration on her model to show how to ace our base!

Our Skin Long Wear Weightless Foundation SPF 50 PA+++ Full Cover Cushion Compact has finally been exclusively launched at Takashimaya! 

Head down to our studio to enjoy the launch specials that we have waiting for you this weekend! 

#BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

Soft, Dewy, Long Wearing and Full Coverage, it's all we need in a cushion! 

Our new cushion will be exclusively launching in our studio in Takashimaya! Head down to check out the exclusive mechanics we have in store for friends of Bobbi Brown! 

#BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

A new cushion will be joining our family!

We'll be dropping hints till the launch day! 

#BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

<EVENT INVITE>

Join us and Beauty Influencer, Faye (@wisteriaful on Instagram) at VivoCity tomorrow from 3 - 5 pm and get a sneak peak of Limited Edition 5-in-1 Face Palette! 

Learn How to Get Ready in 5 - 10 mins with the new palette too! 

#BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

story: Bobbi Brown Cosmetics updated their cover photo.

message:
Oh yes, it's Ladies Night, and our Lips are feeling just right! 

Our #BBGirlCrush ladies in our Crushed Lip Color in Grenadine.

Find your Perfect Lip at our boutiques near you! 

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

We can finally show you what we're Crushin' about! 

Our Crushed Lip Color is finally on counters in 20 kissable shades. Head down to boutiques near you to find your perfect lip! There's sure to be a shade for you.

#BBGirlCrush #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre
Our Senior Makeup Artist Kar Yee modelling for the Popsicle Lip Trend!
We have out #BBGirlCrush Jemma Wei with us today!

ONE MORE DAY! 

Just 1 more day till the official lunch of newest member of the Lipstick faamily! 

These kissable lips are just moments away! 

#BBGirlCrush #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

Just 2 more days till we get our hands on these new lippies! 

Can you gues what shade Anthony is wearing?

#BBGirlCrush #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

We've got these sneak swatches in for you! Here's one of our new shades - Ruby! 

Stay tuned for our official launch on 22 September! 

#BBGirlCrush #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

It's finally Friday and we have a sneak peak for you! 

One of the most anticipated launches for the Season is just 1 week away from the official launch!

Mark your calendars, we promise it'll leave you Crushin' for more. 😉

#BBGirlCrush #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

You no longer have to be worried about the late nights. 

Our Instant Full Cover Concealer covers all late nights secrets with just a swipe! Blend it out with your fingers and you won't be able to tell the difference. It's #BetterThanSleep ! 

Swing by our Studios near you to find your prefect shade! 

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

With the just right tools, everyone can be a Makeup Artist! 

Get the best of both worlds with our Limited Edition Duo Eyeliner Brush - a hybrid of the Ultra Fine Eyeliner Brush and the Ultra Precise Eyeliner Brush. It's the perfect tool to use to get that Double Lining technique going with the Long Wear Gel Eyeliner! 

Head down to one our Studios near you to learn more about our Double Lining Technique and #TurnUpTheSmolder ~ 

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

We just can't get enough of our Downtown Cool Eyeshadow Palette! 

Highly versatile, the palette could even double up as a Brow Kit for Eyebrows, giving you the complete Cool Girl look. 

Visit our boutiques near you today to learn how to #TurnUpTheSmolder

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

Our Iconic Long Wear Gel Eyeliner just got a whole lot better! 

Available in six different combinations, our Long Wear Gel Eyeliner Duos are perfectly paired to accentuate your eyes with our Double Lining technique to #TurnUpTheSmolder ! 

Book a How To Make my Eyes Stand Out lesson at our Studios to learn more about this Double Lining Technique. 😉

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

Sharon is now using the Double Lining technique on Leanne using our iconic Long Wear Gel Eyeliner and also the Mascara Layering technique with our No Smudge Mascara and the Smokey Eye Mascara!

#TurnUpTheSmolder
We are in for a treat! Join our Studio Manger, Sharon Wong and beauty guru Leanne (@loveforskincare) as we show you tricks to get that perfect smoulder !

*Facebook Live Alert!*

We have a cool babe in town to launch the Downtown Cool collection with us today at Robinsons Raffles City!

Tune in at 3.30 pm and join us as we show you the tips and tricks on our Double Lining techniques + How to layer up your favorite Bobbi Brown Mascaras to make your eyes stand out!

See you there! 

#TurnUpTheSmolder #BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

Photo Credits: Leanne (@loveforskincare on Instagram)

There's a new kid in town, and you could say she's... cool.

Our Limited Edition Downtown Cool Collection has made it's way to Singapore, featuring out iconic Long Wear Gel Eyeliners in duo pots - making it the best of both worlds! 

Head down to a store near you to find out more about this cool collection! 

#TurnUpTheSmolder #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

Something cool is headed our way....

Stay tuned to see what's brewing...

#TurnUpTheSmolder #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

When you’re out to dinner and realize there’s eight more courses to go, what’s #betterthansleep?

Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading.

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

When you’ve got a hot date but your dark circles weren’t part of your profile pic, what’s #betterthansleep?

Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading. (Warning: cannot make bad dates disappear.)

#BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

Before & After Series:

Don’t miss out on another Girls Night Out—Jade loves an after-work group hang, but doesn’t love the whole under eye circle thing the next morning. 

With the Instant Full Cover Concealer in Natural, she can stay out with the squad until the last pizza slice! 

#betterthansleep #BobbiBrownSG #BeWhoYouAre

When “just one more episode” turns into six seasons later, what’s #betterthansleep?

Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading. (It’s a stream come true.)

#BobbiBrownSG

Before & After Series:

When FOMO leads to fear of dark circles—Tanya’s under eye troubles can be traced back to all-nighters with visiting out-of-town friends.

Our Instant Full Cover Concealer in Honey keeps her from missing out on group-selfies (though she’ll never miss the dark shadows).

 #betterthansleep #BobbiBrownSG

When you’ve got third-row tix to Broadway, but you know your dark circles will be front row and center in the morning, what’s #betterthansleep? 

Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading.

Check it out at a studio near you! 

#BobbiBrownSG

When you’re a first-time mom and a full night’s Zs is only in your dreams, what’s #betterthansleep? 

Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading! 

#BobbiBrownSG

When you work so late you feel like your second job is managing your under eye circles, what’s #betterthansleep? Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading.

Before & After Series:

Leave your dark circles on the cutting-room floor—Suprova can’t get to bed until her Bollywood dance videos are edited and ready for YouTube. When she’s not putting the finishing touches on her content, she’s deleting her under eye shadows with Instant Full Cover Concealer in Honey because when you’re pursuing your passion our quick-fix formula is #betterthansleep ! 

#BobbiBrownSG

Wedding Season?

Dance until dawn at a summer wedding and hide the evidence with a swipe of our #betterthansleep Instant Full Cover Concealer. If it’s your big day, tuck the Concealer into your bag for flawless, full coverage from ceremony to reception.

#BobbiBrownSG

Event happening now! 

Join our Makeup Artist Valencia and beauty guru Cheryl Chio for the launch of our new Instant Full Cover Concealer! 

We'll be here at Ion Orchard till 6 pm!

Event Invite Alert! 

BETTER.THAN.SLEEP! 

Join Cheryl Chio, best known as @beautifulbuns_sg on Instagram, as she shares her best makeup tips and tricks at Bobbi Brown Ion Orchard this Saturday, 12 August,  from 3 - 5 pm. Not to mention getting the best foundation match you've ever had with our 3 step method. 

Gift bags worth $50 to be won when you RSVP for the event on Cheryl's Instagram Post! Head on over to her page for more information! 

Photo Credits: Cheryl Chio (@beautifulbuns_sg on Instagram)

#BobbiBrownSG #BetterThanSleep

message:
Happy 52nd Birthday Singapore! 

Celebrate in hues of red this National Day.

Fresh-Squeezed-Color with our Art Stick Liquid Lip in Rich Red. 

#MeetYourNewSqueeze #BobbiBrownSG

When you love a late-night show, but don’t want to give your under eye circles top billing, what’s #betterthansleep? Our weightless Instant Full Cover Concealer with its second-skin finish and ability to brighten dark circles with no settling, creasing or fading. (You’ll be yelling bravo!)

Before & After Series:

Got it from your mama: Did you know dark circles can be a hereditary thing? Nikki reaches for our Instant Full Cover Concealer in Warm Honey to keep her inherited under eye shadows under wraps. It’s our quickest fix yet that’s #betterthansleep (and genes).

Before & After Series:

Sew over shadows: When dark circles aren’t in fashion, women’s wear designer Katie whips out her Instant Full Cover Concealer in Ivory to quickly eliminate any under eye shade she’s earned from late nights at the sewing machine. 

#BetterThanSleep

Before & After Series:

Calling all creative night owls: when Pascale’s artistic light bulb doesn’t go on until it’s lights out, she reaches for our Instant Full Cover Concealer in Golden to cover her dark circles (because the witching hour doesn’t mean you need to look scary the next morning).

 #BetterThanSleep

Meet our new Instant Full Cover Concealer.
✓ 15 shades
✓ all-day staying power
✓ weightless wear
The way it lightens and brightens is #BetterThanSleep !

Our new Instant Full Cover Concealer feels like nothing and looks like a good night’s sleep. Dot it under your eyes, blend it out, and you're ready to go!

#BetterThanSleep #BobbiBrownSG

Dot, Swipe, Blend. 

Our Instant Full Cover Concealer works Better Than Sleep. You just got to try it to find out for yourself! 

#BobbiBrownSG #BetterThanSleep

At #BobbiBrown, we believe in empowering women through education. This #InternationalWomensDay, we're excited to announce our global partnership with Kiva, a non-profit organization that helps low income women in over 85 countries secure microloans and create better futures for themselves.

Spread the word!

Embrace the day, ladies!

story: Bobbi Brown Cosmetics updated their cover photo.

message:
Emi Suziki's daily routine - Using the Intensive Skin Serum Concealer, followed by the Intensive Skin Serum Foundation as SKINCARE! 

Packed with an abundance of skincare benefits, your skin will be nourished all day! 

#SerumFoundation #IntensiveSkinSerumFoundation #BobbiBrown #BBAmbassador #ボビィブラウン美容液ファンデ #インテンシブスキンセラムファンデーション @BobbiBrown @BobbiBrownjapan

"I always do my makeup when I’m on shoot and also on off days, but sometimes when I’m tired,  I do not feel like wearing any foundation or applying my daily skincare routine. For me, this is the perfect foundation to make my dreams come true 😍

Bobbi Brown’s Intensive Skin Serum Foundation includes a treatment benefit of Cordyceps and comes in many shade variations.

The Corrector and Concealer makes the skin around my eyes brighter and is available in more than 10 shades! You can always pick your right shade (I’m using Cool Sand btw)! 

For daily makeup, I use the concealer and a little bit of Intensive Skin Serum foundation as skincare!" - Emi Suziki (Instagram: @emisuzuki_official)

#SerumFoundation #IntensiveSkinSerumFoundation #BobbiBrown #BBAmbassador #ボビィブラウン美容液ファンデ #インテンシブスキンセラムファンデーション @BobbiBrown @BobbiBrownjapan

Also, here's another sneak peak at some of our other launches coming out in March... Watch this space!

Oil or Milk?

Our Soothing Cleansing Milk is here! The much anticipated skincare product is a cleanser-oil-lotion hybrid which contains Chia Seed Oils - a major superfood that also works wonders as a skin ingredient!

It is great for double cleansing too! Simply start with the Original Soothing Cleansing Oil to remove your makeup, followed by the Soothing Cleansing Milk to refresh and hydrate the skin.
Visit our studios today to get a travel sized sample today!

#BeWhoYouAre #BobbiBrownSG

"Confidence is healthy beautiful skin. Bobbi's Intensive Skin Serum Foundation with SPF in Warm Beige helps me achieve a flawlessly natural look, instantly!" - @idaandu

#SerumFoundation #IntensiveSkinSerumFoundation #BobbiBrown #BBAmbassador

"Enjoying my coffee and foundation on my working day 😊I have really been enjoying Bobbi Brown Intensive Skin Serum foundation for months now!! It is a skin serum that has sheer foundation inside so it's really good for days that I want my skin to look real but healthy! Fast absorption and brings out the healthy glow." - Pearypie: Make-up Artist/Theatrical Artist

#SerumFoundation #IntensiveSkinSerumFoundation #BobbiBrown #BBAmbassador
